entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
